channel.title: Macos on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay

item.title: My Mac Environment
item.description: Overview Everyone has a different workflow and favorite apps. If my hard drive crashed* and I was rebuilding my computer there would be certain apps that I would reinstall right away. These apps are essential to my workflow for different reasons, but they are all high-quality cutting edge apps that make work easier. Communication and Utility Spark Slack Things3 1Password Development iTerm2 iTerm2 offers a few features that the MacOS’s built-in terminal doesn’t.
